%spark
import com.datastax.spark.connector._ //Imports basic rdd functions
import com.datastax.spark.connector.cql._ //(Optional) Imports java driver helper functions

//SparkContext sparkContext = StorakleSparkConfig.getSparkContext();
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext

val sqlCassandraContext = new CassandraSQLContext(sc)
sqlCassandraContext.setKeyspace("power_data")

result.msg:
import com.datastax.spark.connector._
import com.datastax.spark.connector.cql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext
sqlCassandraContext: org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext = org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra.CassandraSQLContext@17721ef0
sumshiftsHive: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [usagepointpk: int, shift: tinyint, sum(demand): bigint]
sumPivotsHive: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [usagepointpk: int, 0: bigint, 1: bigint, 2: bigint, 3: bigint, 4: bigint, 5: bigint]

paragraphs.text:
%spark
val dataDailys = sqlCassandraContext.cassandraSql("select * from daily_aggregate_demand where year=2014")
val dailyPivots = dataDailys.select("usagepointpk","day_of_week","demand").groupBy("usagepointpk").pivot("day_of_week", Seq(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)).sum("demand")
dailyPivots.show()
val sumDailyPivotsHive = sqlContext.createDataFrame(dailyPivots.rdd, dailyPivots.schema)
sumDailyPivotsHive.registerTempTable("sumDailyPivots")

val shift = sqlCassandraContext.cassandraSql("select usagepointpk, shift, demand from shift_aggregate_demand where year=2014 or year=2015")
val daily = sqlCassandraContext.cassandraSql("select * from daily_aggregate_demand where year=2014 or year=2015")
val data = shift.unionAll(daily.selectExpr("usagepointpk", "10 + day_of_week as shift","demand"))
val sum = data.groupBy("usagepointpk").pivot("shift", Seq(0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17)).sum("demand")
val total = sum.withColumn("total_col", $"0" + $"1" + $"2" + $"3" + $"4" + $"5")
val dataset = total.selectExpr(
    "usagepointpk", 
    "cast(`0` as float) / total_col as h1",
    "cast(`1` as float) / total_col as h2",
    "cast(`2` as float) / total_col as h3",
    "cast(`3` as float) / total_col as h4",
    "cast(`4` as float) / total_col as h5",
    "cast(`5` as float) / total_col as h6",
    "cast(`12` as float) / total_col as d1",
    "cast(`13` as float) / total_col as d2",
    "cast(`14` as float) / total_col as d3",
    "cast(`15` as float) / total_col as d4",
    "cast(`16` as float) / total_col as d5",
    "cast(`17` as float) / total_col as d6",
    "cast(`11` as float) / total_col as d7"
    )
dataset.cache()
//dataset.show()
val datasetHive = sqlContext.createDataFrame(dataset.rdd, dataset.schema)
datasetHive.registerTempTable("dataset")

import ca.ireq.cisri.spark.experiment._
model: org.apache.spark.ml.PipelineModel = pipeline_b74b8ccd7740
clusteredData: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [usagepointpk: int, h1: double, h2: double, h3: double, h4: double, h5: double, h6: double, d1: double, d2: double, d3: double, d4: double, d5: double, d6: double, d7: double, features: vector, prediction: int]
groupedData: org.apache.spark.sql.GroupedData = org.apache.spark.sql.GroupedData@4b0f92b6
+----------+-----+
|prediction|count|
+----------+-----+
|         0|   18|
|         1|   18|
|         2|    9|
+----------+-----+

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select usagepointpk, prediction, d1, d2, d3, d4, d5, d6, d7 from clusteredData

val avgGroupedData = groupedData.avg().selectExpr(
		"prediction",
		"`avg(d1)` as sunday", "`avg(d2)` as monday", "`avg(d3)` as tuesday", "`avg(d4)` as wednesday",
		"`avg(d5)` as thursday", "`avg(d6)` as friday", "`avg(d7)` as saturday",
		"`avg(h1)` as 00_04", "`avg(h2)` as 04_08", "`avg(h3)` as 08_12",
		"`avg(h4)` as 12_16", "`avg(h5)` as 16_20", "`avg(h6)` as 20_24")

val subDays = List("Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday")
val days = "Sunday" :: subDays
val matrixDays = avgGroupedData.select("Sunday", subDays:_*).rdd.collect.map(row => row.toSeq.map({case x: Double => x})).toSeq.transpose
var day = -1
val avgClusteredByDayRDD = sc.parallelize(matrixDays.map(x => {day = (day + 1) % 7; (day + "_" + days(day), x)}))
val avgClusteredByDayUnamed = sqlContext.createDataFrame(avgClusteredByDayRDD.map(row => row match {case (d, Seq(a, b, c)) => (d, a, b, c)}))
val avgClusteredByDay = avgClusteredByDayUnamed.selectExpr("`_1` as Day", "`_2` as Consumer", "`_3` as Business", "`_4` as Industry")
avgClusteredByDay.registerTempTable("avgClusteredByDay")

val subHours = List("04_08", "08_12", "12_16", "16_20", "20_24")
val hours = "00_04" :: subHours
val matrixHours = avgGroupedData.select("00_04", subHours:_*).rdd.collect.map(row => row.toSeq.map({case x: Double => x})).toSeq.transpose
var hour = -1
val avgClusteredByHourRDD = sc.parallelize(matrixHours.map(x => {hour = (hour + 1) % 7; (hours(hour), x)}))
val avgClusteredByHourUnamed = sqlContext.createDataFrame(avgClusteredByHourRDD.map(row => row match {case (h, Seq(a, b, c)) => (h, a, b, c)}))
val avgClusteredByHour = avgClusteredByHourUnamed.selectExpr("`_1` as Hour", "`_2` as Consumer", "`_3` as Business", "`_4` as Industry")
avgClusteredByHour.registerTempTable("avgClusteredByHour")

val keyspace = "power_data"
val dailytable = "daily_aggregate_demand"
val rdd = sc.cassandraTable[Double](keyspace, dailytable)
      .select("demand")
      .where("usagepointpk =1001001 AND year = 2014 AND month = 1 AND day_of_week = 3")
  //    .map(_.headOption)
  //    .collectAsync.map(_.headOption)
